articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Meta is adding AI-powered summaries to WhatsApp - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta announced on Wednesday that it's adding an AI-powered summaries feature to WhatsApp. The optional new feature uses Meta AI to summarize unread
articles.content:
Meta announced on Wednesday that it’s adding an AI-powered summaries feature to WhatsApp. The optional new feature uses Meta AI to summarize unread messages in a chat. 
This summary would only be vi… [+1355 chars]
